actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 9:00 a.m. on November 26, 2024.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on November 22, 2024, at 12:28 p.m.: That the Senate passed S. 759, S. 4708, H.R. 2950, H.R. 5302, and H.R. 5799; and that the Senate passed H.R. 7213 with an amendment.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on November 21, 2024, at 3:45 p.m.: That the Senate passed S. 385, S. 1322, and S. 2868, and agreed to S. Res. 902.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on November 21, 2024, at 3:20 p.m.: That the Senate passed: S. 1153, S. 3959, H.R. 7218, and H.R. 8932.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Rev. Lisa Wink Schultz, Office of the Senate Chaplain, Washington DC
The Speaker designated the Honorable Adrian Smith to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
